description:
With their new ship completed, Luffy and the gang get ready to set sail, but first they`ll have to steal some underpants in order to secure the services of a shipwright!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La nave dei sogni è finita!
Le roi des animaux fait face à la mer ! Un navire de rêve enfin terminé !
The King of Animals That Overlooks the Sea! The Dream Ship Magnificently Completed!
Umi o Nozomu Hyakujuu no Ou! Yume no Fune Doudou Kansei!
Царь зверей, царь всех морей! Корабль мечты с помпой завершён!
ملك الحيوانات الّذي يُشرف على البحر! اكتملت سفينة الأحلام بشكل رائع!
海を臨む百獣の王! 夢の船堂々完成!
